titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to provide Federal financial assistance to States to implement State energy security plans, and for other purposes.
Enhancing State Energy Security Planning and Emergency Preparedness Act of 2019
Enhancing State Energy Security Planning and Emergency Preparedness Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
